upload.title: Upload file
upload.dragDropText: Drag & drop or click to choose a file
upload.fileDescription: File upload is designed for small files like ssh keys and certificates.
upload.errorSelectFile: Please select a file to upload
upload.expirationLegendFile: The encrypted file will be deleted automatically after

display.captionDecryptionKey: Do not refresh this window as secret might be restricted to one time download.
display.inputDecryptionKeyLabel: A decryption key is required, please enter it below
display.secureMessageSubtitle: You've received a secure message that can only be viewed once
display.oneTimeWarning: This message will self-destruct after viewing. Once revealed, it cannot be accessed again.
display.oneTimeWarningReady: Make sure you're ready to view it now.

error.title: Secret does not exist
error.subtitle: It might be caused by any of these reasons.
error.subtitleOpenedBefore: A secret can be restricted to a single download. It might be lost because the sender clicked this link before you viewed it.
error.subtitleOpenedCompromised: The secret might have been compromised and read by someone else. You should contact the sender and request a new secret.
error.subtitleBrokenLink: The link must match perfectly in order for the decryption to work, it might be missing some magic digits.
error.subtitleExpired: No secret lasts forever. All stored secrets will expire and self destruct automatically. Lifetime varies from one hour up to one week.

result.title: Secret stored securely
result.subtitle: Your secret has been encrypted and stored. Share these links to provide access.
result.subtitleDownloadOnce: Secret can only be downloaded once. So do not open the link yourself. The cautious should send the decryption key in a separate communication channel.
result.rowOneClickDescription: Share this link for direct access to the secret
result.rowShortLinkDescription: Requires the decryption key to be shared separately
result.rowDecryptionKeyDescription: Required to decrypt the message with the short link

secret.subtitleFile: Your file has been decrypted and downloaded. If you need to download it again, click the button below.
secret.subtitleMessage: This secret will not be accessible again. Make sure to save it now!

delete.messageDeleted: The secret is removed from the server!
delete.dialogMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this secret?

features.title: Share secrets securely with ease
features.subtitle: Yopass is created to reduce the amount of clear text passwords stored in email and chat conversations by encrypting and generating a short lived link which can only be viewed once.
features.featureEndToEndText: Encryption and decryption are being made locally in the browser. The key is never stored with yopass.
features.featureSelfDestructionText: Encrypted messages have a fixed lifetime and will be deleted automatically after expiration.
features.featureOneTimeText: The encrypted message can only be downloaded once which reduces the risk of someone peeking at your secrets.
features.featureSimpleSharingText: Yopass generates a unique one click link for the encrypted file or message. The decryption password can alternatively be sent separately.
features.featureNoAccountsText: Sharing should be quick and easy; No additional information except the encrypted secret is stored in the database.
features.featureOpenSourceText: Yopass encryption mechanism are built on open source software meaning full transparency with the possibility to audit and submit features.
